name: Sol Duc
description: Olympic Hot Springs in Olympic National Park
insider_tips: The third pool from the entrance is the warmest and least crowded. Bring water shoes as the rocks can be slippery. If you're here during heavy rain, check the river level - it can flood the lower pools.
nearby_gems: Hike to Sol Duc Falls (1.6 miles), Appleton Pass trail for wildflowers in July, Fairy Lake for photography
maintenance_day: Closed first Tuesday of each month
alerts: No current alerts - all pools open
